channel.title: Pradosh Adhikari - Laravel Developer Updates
channel.description: Latest updates from Pradosh Adhikari, Professional Laravel Developer and Full Stack Web Developer in Dharan, Nepal. Expert in PHP, Laravel, MySQL, JavaScript and modern web development.

item.title: Professional Laravel Developer Services in Dharan
item.description: Offering professional Laravel development services in Dharan, Nepal. Specialized in custom web applications, e-commerce solutions, and modern website development using PHP, Laravel, MySQL, and JavaScript.

item.title: Latest Web Development Projects Portfolio
item.description: Showcasing latest web development projects including Glory Cleaning Services, Samachar News Portal, Supply Chain Management System, and SOS Ambulance Service. All built with Laravel framework and modern web technologies.

item.title: Full Stack Web Development Skills and Expertise
item.description: Comprehensive skill set in Laravel Framework (85%), PHP (88%), MySQL Database (80%), JavaScript (75%), HTML5 (95%), CSS3 & SCSS (90%), and modern web development tools and frameworks.

item.title: Contact Laravel Developer in Dharan, Nepal
item.description: Get in touch for professional web development services. Based in Dharan, Sunsari, Nepal. Available for Laravel development projects, custom web applications, and freelance work. Phone: +977 9840713733
